    • Field Detail

      • logger

        protected static org.apache.log4j.Logger logger

      • regularStyle

        protected org.apache.poi.hssf.usermodel.HSSFCellStyle regularStyle
        When adding new CellStyles, don't forget to inherit the value in the constructor from the parent! Not doing so will cause export to crash on big reports due to the number of styles limitation in an excell sheet.
